name: Rejected Space Cadets
description:
An old project I designed around the song itself.

Use mouse/touch to move, or WASD keys. Space to pause 

Bump asteroids into the receptacle above you. The physics are not realistic. 

Credits

Asteroids by paramecij
http://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/

Music by Eric Matyas
